message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You got greedy, now it's my turn to make a good deal!
I'll compromise, but I'm not getting taken advantage of
You're getting desperate, I'm getting greedy!
I'm not giving up yet, let's try to find a better deal
You're running out of time, take it or leave it!
I'm not giving up yet, I'll try to squeeze out a better deal
You're getting close to zero, don't expect me to go easy on you!
I'm running out of options, but I'll try to get a slightly better deal

I'm not accepting your final offer, I'll try to get something better
Fine, you want it all? I'll give it to you, but you'll regret it!
